name: Technology Center
description: Clients have access to a computer and printing facilities to assist with their daily needs. This includes tasks such as checking email, uploading important documents, and more.
fullDescription: Clients have access to a computer and printing facilities to assist with their daily needs. This includes tasks such as checking email, uploading important documents, and more.
whatTheyOffer: Clients have access to a computer and printing facilities to assist with their daily needs. This includes tasks such as checking email, uploading important documents, and more.
howToGetIt: Call the Bay Area Women’s & Children’s Center (415) 474-2400 for more information
agency: Bay Area Women's and Children's Center
